name: titles
desc: Provides a straightforward means to place text in the Viewer.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Title
properties.desc: The Title is the text to use for the Title.

properties.name: Title Size
properties.desc: The Title Size determines how large the title text will be.

properties.name: Title Color
properties.desc: The Title Color is the color to use for the Title

properties.name: Title Font
properties.desc: Title Font allows the user to alter the basic look of the font.

properties.name: Anchor Side
properties.desc: The Anchor Side determines whether the title text is positioned off the top or bottom edge of the viewer.

properties.name: Anchor Margin
properties.desc: The Anchor Margin determines how far from the anchor side the near edge of the text will be.

properties.name: Left Margin
properties.desc: The Left Margin determines how close to the left edge of the viewer the text is allowed to be.

properties.name: Right Margin
properties.desc: The Right Margin determines how close to the left edge of the viewer the text is allowed to be.

properties.name: Rotation
properties.desc: The Rotation allows you to spin the title text around wh point ther center would be if not rotated.

properties.name: Overlay
properties.desc: The Overlay control allows the user to put the logo behind the model or in front of it.

properties.name: N1
properties.desc: The N1 field is a double value that can be used as the variable {N1} in the expression.

properties.name: N2
properties.desc: The N2 field is a double value that can be used as the variable {N2} in the expression.

properties.name: S1
properties.desc: The S1 field is a string value that can be used as the variable {S1} in the expression.
